TopicTitle: Falcon Command Cockpit + Docking Assistance Light and more

Articles.Content:
Falcon Command Cockpit

Details: IVA version of the Falcon Drone released in the first version of Mysterious Projects. This will include monitors that let you view the exterior of the cockpit from two cameras, in addition to multiple screens with flight information, thanks to RasterPropMonitor from Mihara. The joystick will also move accurately, thanks to Firespitter.

Docking Assistance Light

Details: This is a part that can be placed on the surface of a craft before placing a Clamp-O-Tron docking port directly on top of it, and will light up the docking port without draining energy to help you complete an accurate dock without sunlight. It will not interfere with collision of the port.

Aurora Mk2 Radial Atomic Nacelle

Details: More powerful radial version of the small Aurora Atomic Thruster.

Courier I Rocket and heavy-duty decoupler

Details: Originally made to power the

into orbit, these two parts will also be in the next release, coming soon.

Also in the works:

Falcon aerodynamic parts

new aircraft cockpit + IVA + body

ground vehicle frames and more

Edited November 21, 2013 by Nazari1382

I've got an idea for the docking light's name/desc.

It should include something about chemiluminescent, explaining the lack of power usage...

nice to see an IVA on that pod btw!

(Could we get one with no air-intake on it possibly?)
This sounds promising, we really need more ground frames and aircraft cockpits.

Yep! It'll be a whole new look though.

Awesome! That's what it needed =)

Really interested in the Courier rocket...any more info on it...size, engine parameters? Will it only be useful in shuttle launch roles, or can be fit for traditional payload launches?
I like that IVA! I hate that so few cockpits give you any decent visibility. Any shots of what the exterior looks like?

Khaos the Courier was released with the ROC shuttle you can actually get both in this thread if you want to try it now: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/26533-White-Owl-s-KSP-Video-Series/page9

It has a huge amount of mass and thrust, and it can probably lift anything because it gimbals. If I make any changes they'll be cosmetic.

I like that IVA! I hate that so few cockpits give you any decent visibility. Any shots of what the exterior looks like?

Here's an exterior shot of the cockpit: http://i.imgur.com/tcn0JMZ.png

This thread is for discussion of the development of the addon mentioned in the OP. If there is a problem with a post, please utilize the forum's post report system.

Keep this thread civil and on-topic.
Hi there! Is this mod still alive or merged into another mod? As I played ksp the last time a year ago i really loved the Aurora Mk2 Radial Atomic Nacelle.
